publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3701 Carolyn Leckie: TETRA Masts Moratorium—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive, under the proximity principle, to impose a moratorium on the building and planning of all TETRA masts in Scotland and to undertake an immediate review into the potential health hazards of long and short-term exposure to electromagnetic fields at all relevant frequencies from TETRA masts and to provide information to the public on the health impacts of electromagnetic fields and the measures taken to address them.
